extendedInfo.description: AppMe is the new, unique app which gives you and your friends a fast and free way to stay in contact with each other. With AppMe you have a great "Instant Messenger" at your disposal to exchange messages live with your friends â whether in private or as a group chat. It works just as fast and easily as a text message, but without the extra costs.Friend Network===========Your AppMe friends will automatically be added from your mobile phone's address book. Unlike the traditional "social networks" (such as Facebook), they will be much more closely and privately linked to you: quality instead of quantity! With your own wall for status updates and comments, you can share your thoughts and ideas with your friends and stay up to date.App CheckIns=========Show your friends which apps you like and use. Keep tabs on which hot apps your friends are using. With the "App CheckIn" function, your favorite apps will show up on your personal wall. Your friends can install these apps themselves right from your wall with just a few clicks.... and a whole lot more================There are a lot more functions to discover that you soon won't want to do without.+ Text display in the chat while you type: a brand-new live chat experience which is a lot faster and more fun than anywhere else.+ Friend map with integrated route display: this is where your friends are right now. This feature can, of course, be deactivated in your privacy settings.+ Received and read status for each message: no more worrying about whether or not your message got through.Free â no hidden costs===============AppMe can be installed and used absolutely free. You only have the normal costs for mobile data transfer, which are usually covered by a flat rate. Of course, fast WLAN access is also possible. With AppMe there's no annoying advertising, and it's available worldwide.Cross Platform - for many systems=======================AppMe is currently available for Android and iOS (iPhone, iPod touch and iPad). It will also be available shortly for Blackberry and Windows Mobile. In addition, there will be a web app for your browser. Parallel logins on multiple platforms is no problem; all data will be synchronized live.Privacy â full control and security=======================AppMe respects the privacy of its users and does not transfer any private data (like your local address book, GPS position, etc.) without your explicit approval. Even other settings like your public profile or the live display chat can be individually activated or deactivated. All data transfers take place over a secure SSL encryption system.

reviews.title: Great app but,
reviews.comment: I have been using this app on iPad 3 and recently on android. I REALLY like the idea of connecting people on one app. I really do. I have not had any problem with it, but it needs some improvement such as: 1) add the ability to copy & paste text, link, etc. 2) add a choice to save others pictures that shared with public. 3) You cannot open a link., please fix it. I\'ll will write another reviews whenever needed.
reviews.author: Fallen Angel

reviews.title: Overall works very well
reviews.comment: Similar to imessage in ios, in fact a great way to communicate with friends that use Apple devices.  But the app needs some work to improve the restarts and crashes. You simply try about three times and it loads ok and works nicely.
reviews.author: John Pettifor

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: Everytime I try and chat the app crashes. Great way to keep in touch with Apple device but the crashing is ridiculous.
